column5: Set beside Packery Channel in Corpus Christi, this waterside 3BR, 2.5BA condo is just a 10-minute walk to the beach and close to an eclectic dining scene, shops, fishing, and coastal parks. Includes a private dock, pier, and sunbathing deck. Sleeps 8.
column8: Waterside Townhome w/ Private Boat Dock
